newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.AFRICA'S AVI SEES NO NEED TO UNBUNDLE.
newsitem.headline: S.AFRICA'S AVI SEES NO NEED TO UNBUNDLE.

text.p: South African industrial group Anglovaal Industries Ltd (AVI) said on Monday that it saw no need to launch an unbundling programme of its investments.
South Africa's economy is marked by its sprawling holding companies and several have decided to unbundle their assets into separate firms.
But AVI managing director Richard Savage told a news conference that the group had done well in its present shape.
"We have done very well and we do not intend just selling off investments," he said.
Savage added that the group would only unbundle an investment in order to reinvest the funds in another market where the returns would be higher.
Savage was speaking as the group announced a tie-up wuith U.S. tyre giant Goodyear Tyre and Rubber Co .
